description: CLEARBROOK VILLAGE inside unit located in a quiet cul-de-sac area of the complex. Original condition (fixer-upper) except new flooring being installed in the living room, dining room and entry hallway. New hot water tank, newer roofing, windows and electrical upgrades. Walk to Rotary Stadium, schools, shopping and restaurants. No age restrictions, rentals allowed and 1 dog or cat allowed. Bring your renovation ideas to life in this great starter townhome. Quick possession possible.
